page.title: 01PURBROOK VILLAGE
page.content: Purbrook Village is situated on the London Road(A3) between Portsmouth and Waterlooville. It serves an urban area of mainly privately owned houses and bungalows. The average price of a three bedroomed semi-detached house in the area would be approx.Â£42000. The people in the area are employed in a wide variety of jobs; naval personnel,dockyard workers,computer orientated industries,clerical workers and light electrical industries. The village itself consists of a number of shops and public houses.These include a chemist,a garage,a service station,a bicycle shop,a newsagent,a builders merchants,an estate agents,a building society,a hairdressers,a tool hire company,a dental mechanic and a tattooist.
